Original: You will accept that request? It calls
for you to deliver a [Color:5][Item:1446][Color:0],
found in [Color:5]B1F of the Golden Lair[Color:0].
[Page]
The client is a girl who wants to send
her brother an accessory made from
an icy stone.
[Page]
It is a simple delivery that should
require little effort on your part.
Simply bring it back here.
[Page]
I am counting on you and shall await
your swift return.
Translation: You will accept that request? It calls
for you to deliver a [Color:5][Item:1446][Color:0],
found in [Color:5]B1F of the Golden Lair[Color:0].
[Page]
The client is a girl who wants to send
her brother an accessory made from
an icy stone.
[Page]
It is a simple delivery that should
require little effort on your part.
Simply bring it back here.
[Page]
I am counting on you and shall await
your swift return.

Original: Welcome back. Oh? What's this? You
came back empty-handed...
[Page]
Well, no matter. It appears that the
client's brother has just received an
ice stone from his lover.
[Page]
That is why the client left a message
telling me to cancel the request upon
your return.
[Page]
The girl laughed it off, saying she
could not compare to his lover.
[Page]
Well, I'm off to return the reward to
the client. I again thank you for
your hard work.
Translation: Welcome back. Oh? What's this? You
came back empty-handed...
[Page]
Well, no matter. It appears that the
client's brother has just received an
ice stone from his lover.
[Page]
That is why the client left a message
telling me to cancel the request upon
your return.
[Page]
The girl laughed it off, saying she
could not compare to his lover.
[Page]
Well, I'm off to return the reward to
the client. I again thank you for
your hard work.

Original: Ah, welcome back. Yes, this is the
requested ice stone... and here is
your reward.
[Page]
Hm? You ran into difficulties with a
soldier badgering you? That is odd.
[Page]
Could the soldier's lover be the
client's brother...? No, but that...
I... Hrm!
[Page]
Has there been a surge in popularity
for ice stones? The demand seems to
have risen dramatically...
[Page]
But instead of accepting a bribe, you
kept your focus on the request, yes?
I am pleased to hear it...
Translation: Ah, welcome back. Yes, this is the
requested ice stone... and here is
your reward.
[Page]
Hm? You ran into difficulties with a
soldier badgering you? That is odd.
[Page]
Could the soldier's lover be the
client's brother...? No, but that...
I... Hrm!
[Page]
Has there been a surge in popularity
for ice stones? The demand seems to
have risen dramatically...
[Page]
But instead of accepting a bribe, you
kept your focus on the request, yes?
I am pleased to hear it...

Original: On your quest to find an ice stone,
you arrive at a dead end on a small
path.
[Page]
Through a crack in a boulder, you can
see a beautiful [Color:5][Item:1446][Color:0]. It
appears to be the last one.
[Page]
Luckily, one is all you will need to
fulfill your request.
Translation: On your quest to find an ice stone,
you arrive at a dead end on a small
path.
[Page]
Through a crack in a boulder, you can
see a beautiful [Color:5][Item:1446][Color:0]. It
appears to be the last one.
[Page]
Luckily, one is all you will need to
fulfill your request.

Original: [Color:5]Take the [Item:1446]?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Take the [Item:1446]?[Color:0]

Original: You leave the ice stone where it is,
deciding to come back for it later.
Translation: You leave the ice stone where it is,
deciding to come back for it later.

Original: Just as you are putting your newfound
ice stone in your pack, you hear a
voice calling to you.
[Page]
"Ah! Please wait!"
Translation: Just as you are putting your newfound
ice stone in your pack, you hear a
voice calling to you.
[Page]
"Ah! Please wait!"

Original: "E... excuse me, sorry to bother you.
But, um, c-could you... give me that
ice stone you just took?"
[Page]
The soldier is panting heavily, out of
breath...
[Page]
"My lover's birthday is coming up,
and I want that ice stone to make an
accessory as a gift."
[Page]
You explain the situation, and after
you tell him you cannot part with it,
he holds up one hand and speaks.
[Page]
"I'm not asking you give it away free,
you understand! Would you maybe trade
it for this [Color:6][Item:1334][Color:0]?
[Page]
"It'll be better than whatever reward
you're getting," he insists, staring
at you pleadingly.
[Page]
If you are interested in his offer,
you see nothing wrong with accepting
a trade.
[Page]
Though if you give away this last ice
stone, you will be unable to claim the
reward from your client...
Translation: "E... excuse me, sorry to bother you.
But, um, c-could you... give me that
ice stone you just took?"
[Page]
The soldier is panting heavily, out of
breath...
[Page]
"My lover's birthday is coming up,
and I want that ice stone to make an
accessory as a gift."
[Page]
You explain the situation, and after
you tell him you cannot part with it,
he holds up one hand and speaks.
[Page]
"I'm not asking you give it away free,
you understand! Would you maybe trade
it for this [Color:6][Item:1334][Color:0]?
[Page]
"It'll be better than whatever reward
you're getting," he insists, staring
at you pleadingly.
[Page]
If you are interested in his offer,
you see nothing wrong with accepting
a trade.
[Page]
Though if you give away this last ice
stone, you will be unable to claim the
reward from your client...

Original: [Color:5]Accept the man's offer?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Accept the man's offer?[Color:0]

Original: "Oh... oh, thank you! Oh, my beloved
will be so happy with this!"
[Page]
He quickly takes the ice stone from
you, hands you the item in trade,
and runs off, whooping as he goes.
Translation: "Oh... oh, thank you! Oh, my beloved
will be so happy with this!"
[Page]
He quickly takes the ice stone from
you, hands you the item in trade,
and runs off, whooping as he goes.

Original: You have lost the ice stone you were
meant to deliver! You suppose there is
nothing to do but report to the bar.
Translation: You have lost the ice stone you were
meant to deliver! You suppose there is
nothing to do but report to the bar.

Original: You shake your head to turn the man
down, but he does not relent!
[Page]
"Okay... Okay! What if I threw in this
[Color:6][Item:1335][Color:0]!? I'm on my hands and knees
begging you!"
Translation: You shake your head to turn the man
down, but he does not relent!
[Page]
"Okay... Okay! What if I threw in this
[Color:6][Item:1335][Color:0]!? I'm on my hands and knees
begging you!"

Original: You remain firm, and with tears in his
eyes, he pleads with you further...!
[Page]
"ARGH! All right, I can even add this
[Color:6][Item:1376][Color:0] to the bargain! But that's
my final offer! You're killing me!"
Translation: You remain firm, and with tears in his
eyes, he pleads with you further...!
[Page]
"ARGH! All right, I can even add this
[Color:6][Item:1376][Color:0] to the bargain! But that's
my final offer! You're killing me!"

Original: The soldier's face turns ashen as you
stand your ground regarding his offer.
[Page]
"Is... is there really no way...?"
Translation: The soldier's face turns ashen as you
stand your ground regarding his offer.
[Page]
"Is... is there really no way...?"

Original: You leave the man where he is and walk
away with firm steps.
[Page]
Prioritizing your task over bribery,
you have kept the ice stone! You must
now deliver it to the client...
Translation: You leave the man where he is and walk
away with firm steps.
[Page]
Prioritizing your task over bribery,
you have kept the ice stone! You must
now deliver it to the client...

Original: The kneeling soldier is weeping
bitterly... You should leave him
to his anguish...
Translation: The kneeling soldier is weeping
bitterly... You should leave him
to his anguish...
